command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 26oPSLF1JrHBkC1.root --database GS77b3TFJGdjuXRCHKnBPH --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE oracle_messages;
stdout:
Table	Create Table
oracle_messages	CREATE TABLE `oracle_messages` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `conversationId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `role` enum('user','zoltar') NOT NULL,
  `content` longtext NOT NULL,
  `sourceChunkIds` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `hasKnowledge` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,
  `responseTimeMs` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=90001
